price: 10. Dan orang-orang yang kafir dan mendustakan ayat-ayat Kami, mereka itulah penghuni neraka, mereka kekal di dalamnya. Dan itulah seburuk-buruk tempat kembali.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَكَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna kafarū wakadhabū biāyātinā ulāika aṣḥābu al-nāri khālidīna fīhā wabi'sa al-maṣīru
